name: Croc Slots
description:
My Website   Instagram   Twitter

Survey to help me improve Croc Slots

                                                                                                                       The Carnival is in town!   As the Carnies are setting up to get everyone there, they have an unfortunate accident & lose an important device for the Ring Leader! Now they will try everything in their power to bring it to him, in order to save their own skins!

Croc Slots is a horror platformer about a crocodile named Crockett,

who comes across a slot machine & goes on a wild journey full of terror!

                                                                                                                    

                         

Encounter fun NPCs, who will help guide you on your journey!

Collect coins,  spin to get richer & win powerups to use during your adventure!

But beware, good fortune gives birth to misfortune!

Experience wild horrors, things aren't quite right ever since the Carnival came to town!

Discover the truth behind the mysterious Carnival,  their cryptic Ring Leader & the strange slot machine!


Keyboard Controls
